com.zebra.sdk.common.card.device

Interface DeviceUtil

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ZebraCardPrinter, ZebraPrinterZmotif, ZebraPrinterZxp

    public interface DeviceUtil
    Defines functions used for printer related operations.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AlarmInfo checkForAlarm()
      Gets the printer's current alarm code.

      Clears any custom line data from the OCP and returns it to the main view.

      Returns the printer's magnetic encoder configuration.

      Returns a List of the printer's installed media information.

      Returns the transfer type of the printer.

    • Method Detail

      • checkForAlarm

        AlarmInfo checkForAlarm()
                        throws ConnectionException,
                               ZebraCardException
        Gets the printer's current alarm code.
        Returns:
        printer alarm code.
        • Refer to ZebraCardErrors for list of error codes and descriptions
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if their is an error communicating with the printer.
        ZebraCardException - if the device is busy.

      • clearOCPDisplay

        void clearOCPDisplay(boolean lockOCP)
                     throws ConnectionException,
                            SettingsException,
                            ZebraCardException
        Clears any custom line data from the OCP and returns it to the main view.
        Parameters:
        lockOCP - true to lock the printer's OCP display.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while clearing the OCP display.
        ZebraCardException - if the device is busy.

      • getCardCount

        CardCountInfo getCardCount()
                           throws ConnectionException,
                                  SettingsException,
                                  ZebraCardException
        Returns the printer's total card count values.
        Returns:
        instance populated with the printer's card count information.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while retrieving the card count.
        ZebraCardException - if the device is busy.

      • getMagneticEncoderConfiguration

        MagneticEncoderInfo getMagneticEncoderConfiguration()
                                                    throws ConnectionException,
                                                           SettingsException,
                                                           ZebraCardException
        Returns the printer's magnetic encoder configuration.
        Returns:
        instance populated with the printer's installed magnetic encoder configuration.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while retrieving the magnetic encoder configuration.
        ZebraCardException - if the device is busy.

        OCPDisplayInfo getOCPDisplay()
                             throws ConnectionException,
                                    SettingsException,
                                    ZebraCardException

        Returns:
        instance populated with the printer's OCP line data.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while retrieving the OCP display information.
        ZebraCardException - if the device is busy.

                                  throws ConnectionException,
                                         SettingsException,
                                         ZebraCardException
        Returns the printer's specific device information.
        Returns:
        instance populated with the printer specific information.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while retrieving the printer information.
        ZebraCardException - if the device is busy.

                                   throws ConnectionException,
                                          SettingsException,
                                          ZebraCardException

        Returns:
        instance populates with the printer's status information.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while retrieving the printer's status.
        ZebraCardException - if the device is busy.

      • getMediaInformation

        java.util.List<MediaInfo> getMediaInformation()
                                              throws ConnectionException,
                                                     SettingsException,
                                                     ZebraCardException
        Returns a List of the printer's installed media information.
        Returns:
        list of MediaInfo instance/s populated with the printer's installed media information.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while retrieving the media information.
        ZebraCardException - if the device is busy.

      • getSensorStates

        java.util.Map<String,String> getSensorStates()
                                             throws ConnectionException,
                                                    SettingsException,
                                                    ZebraCardException
        Returns the printer's sensor states.
        Returns:
        map of the printer's various sensor names and states.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while retrieving sensor states.
        ZebraCardException - if the device is busy.

      • getSensorValues

        java.util.Map<String,String> getSensorValues()
                                             throws ConnectionException,
                                                    SettingsException,
                                                    ZebraCardException
        Returns the printer's sensor values.
        Returns:
        map of the printer's various sensor names and values.
        • Key = sensor name
        • Value = sensor value
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while retrieving the sensor values.
        ZebraCardException - if the device is busy.

      • getSmartCardConfiguration

        SmartCardInfo getSmartCardConfiguration()
                                        throws ConnectionException,
                                               SettingsException,
                                               ZebraCardException
        Returns the printer's smart card configuration.
        Returns:
        instance populated with the printer's installed smart card configuration.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while retrieving the printer.
        ZebraCardException - if the device is busy.

      • registerAlarmHandler

        void registerAlarmHandler(AlarmHandler alarmHandler)
        Registers a callback routine for asynchronous reporting of printer alarm conditions.
        Parameters:
        alarmHandler - An instance that is used to handle printer alarm conditions.

      • reset

        void reset()
           throws ConnectionException,
                  ZebraCardException
        Resets the printer.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if there is an error communicating with the printer.
        ZebraCardException - if the device is busy.

      • setOCPDisplay

        void setOCPDisplay(OCPDisplayInfo ocpDisplay)
                   throws ConnectionException,
                          SettingsException,
                          ZebraCardException
        Displays the specified line data on the printer's OCP.
        Parameters:
        ocpDisplay - an instance populated with the OCP line data to be displayed.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while retrieving the printer's OCP display information.
        ZebraCardException - if there is a printer error or ocpDisplay is invalid.

      • updateFirmware

        void updateFirmware(String firmwareFilePath)
                    throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                           ConnectionException,
                           ZebraCardException
        Updates the printers firmware.
        Parameters:
        firmwareFilePath - full path to the firmware file.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the firmwareFilePath is not found.
        ConnectionException - if there is an error communicating with the printer.
        ZebraCardException - if there is a printer error or firmwareFilePath is invalid.

      • updateFirmware

        void updateFirmware(String firmwareFilePath,
                  CardFirmwareUpdateHandler handler)
                    throws ConnectionException,
                           DiscoveryException,
                           java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException,
                           java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                           ZebraCardException
        Updates the printers firmware.
        Parameters:
        firmwareFilePath - Full path to the firmware file.
        handler - Callback for firmware status updates.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if there is an error communicating with the printer.
        DiscoveryException - if attempting to reconnect fails.
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the firmwareFilePath is not found.
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - if the firmware update times out.
        ZebraCardException - if there is a printer error or firmwareFilePath is invalid.

      • hasMagneticEncoder

        boolean hasMagneticEncoder()
                           throws ConnectionException,
                                  SettingsException,
                                  ZebraCardException
        Returns true if printer includes magnetic encoder
        Returns:
        true if the printer has a Magnetic Encoder.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while retrieving the printer's configuration information.
        ZebraCardException - if the device is busy.

      • getPrintCapability

        TransferType getPrintCapability()
                                throws ConnectionException,
                                       SettingsException,
                                       ZebraCardException
        Returns the transfer type of the printer.
        Returns:
        the transfer type of the printer.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while retrieving the printer's transfer type.
        ZebraCardException - if the device is busy.

      • hasLaminator

        boolean hasLaminator()
                     throws ConnectionException,
                            SettingsException,
                            ZebraCardException
        Returns true if printer includes a laminator.
        Returns:
        true if printer configuration includes a laminator.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while retrieving the printer's configuration information.
        ZebraCardException - if the device is busy.
